title: FS: T3 Turkey Red Crawford  PSA-4MK   SOLD
author: T3s

posts.post_title: FS: T3 Turkey Red Crawford  PSA-4MK   SOLD
posts.post_content:
This T3 Turkey Red of Sam Crawford is soooo nice.  This card came from my South Carolina find of late 2011, purchased from the grandson of the original owner.

The color and focus are wonderful.  It should probably be a 5MK, but whatever.  It's such a beautiful example of this popular card.

My scanner is giving me problems currently so the card is shown "pre-slab", but it now resides in a PSA-4MK holder, cert #19279988.  If you need scans of the card in the holder, no problem, but be patient - thanks.

Asking only SOLD, shipped and insured.  Thanks again.

Happy Collecting,
Craig

Sharp card.  You can actually get a better sense of the condition outside of the holder.   I'd be all over this if it wasn't for the fact I already have this card.

What does the notation on the reverse say?  "Peid pleasant drug"???

All the best, Craig.  I'll be on the lookout for any future T3s you post.

Thanks Chuck,

It says "Reid Pleasant Drug".  I'm guessing it was the local drug store.
